column1:
Overall Sentiment Percentages: 
Cleaniness: 64.3% 
Amenities: 63.1% 
Location: 61.1% 
Services: 59.2% 
General: 65.2% 
Value: 58.6%

Suggestions to Improve in Each Aspect:
Cleaniness: Increase the focus on cleanliness standards and put in place more stringent and regular inspections.
Amenities: Increase the availability of amenities at the location and provide customers with the convenience they need.
Location: Make sure the location is easily accessible and provide customers with accurate and up to date information on how to reach the location.
Services: Enhance customer service standards by providing excellent customer service and paying attention to customer needs.
General: Focus on providing an overall better experience by making sure the atmosphere is inviting, the staff is knowledgeable and helpful, and that the d√©cor is appealing.
Value: Make sure customers have a clear understanding of the value they are getting and that they are getting a good deal for what they are paying for. Offer competitive pricing and special discounts or deals whenever possible.
